title: Leadership, Community Service
text:
Leadership, Community Service


Leadership


HR Team Lead ‚Äì College Festivals: Led the HR and coordination team for multiple intra-college fests, overseeing volunteer management, event staffing, and conflict resolution. Developed strong leadership, communication, and organizational skills.


Model United Nations (MUN) Delegate: Participated in MUN conferences, representing nations in simulated UN sessions. Honed diplomacy, research, and public speaking skills through debate and negotiation.


Community Service


NSS Member ‚Äì National Service Scheme (3 Years): Actively involved in rural outreach programs, sanitation drives, and educational awareness campaigns. Demonstrated commitment to social responsibility and community development through consistent service.

About Me


MBA student with 2.3 years of HR Analyst experience, seeking entry-level roles in HR and recruitment. Skilled in HR analytics and data management, with a strong interest in organizational culture and market trends. Committed to continuous learning and contributing meaningfully to HR functions.

title: Projects
text:
Projects


Customer Credit Prediction ‚Äì Machine Learning


Tools: Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, MatplotlibDomain: Financial Analytics



Developed a credit risk classification model using machine learning techniques.


Performed EDA to uncover patterns and correlations.


Cleaned and preprocessed data, handling missing values and encoding categorical variables.


Engineered features and defined the problem as predicting credit risk levels (Low/Medium/High).


Trained and evaluated models including Logistic Regression and Random Forest, achieving ~85% accuracy.


Identified key predictive features and interpreted business implications.



Skills: Data analysis, model evaluation, feature engineering, classification modeling.


Digital Community Platform ‚Äì AWS Cloud Implementation


Tools: AWS (EC2, RDS, VPC, S3), MySQLDomain: Cloud Computing



Designed and deployed a cloud-based platform for a coffee shop‚Äôs online community.


Assessed AWS services for scalability, cost-efficiency, and security.


Configured VPC, launched EC2 instances, and set up RDS with MySQL for dynamic data storage.


Developed and connected a sample web app to demonstrate platform functionality.


Estimated AWS costs for text, image, and video data with IOPS considerations.


Documented setup steps and addressed implementation challenges.



Skills: Cloud architecture, AWS service integration, database setup, cost analysis.

title: Skills & Certifications
text:
Skills & Certifications


Certifications



AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (2024‚Äì2027)Validates foundational knowledge of AWS cloud concepts, services, security, billing, and global infrastructure. Demonstrates ability to articulate the value of AWS Cloud and navigate core services for technical and non-technical use cases.


AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (Link)

Python for Data Science ‚Äì IBM (Sep 2024)Focused on data handling, visualization, and machine learning basics using Python. Built hands-on projects involving Pandas, Numpy, and data visualization tools to analyze and model real-world datasets.


Python for Data Science ‚Äì IBM (Link)


Certified Digital Marketing Associate ‚Äì DMI (Jun 2024)Covers digital marketing fundamentals including SEO, PPC, email marketing, and analytics. Certified by the Digital Marketing Institute, showcasing competence in designing and managing online campaigns.


AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (Link)



Technical Skills



AWS (Amazon Web Services): Hands-on experience configuring EC2, RDS, VPC, and S3 to build secure, scalable, and cost-effective cloud applications.


Python for Data Analytics: Skilled in using Python for data cleaning, visualization, and machine learning with libraries such as Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn. Applied to real business problems like credit risk modeling.


Tableau: Proficient in creating dynamic dashboards and visual stories to convey key insights. Used for turning complex datasets into clear, decision-oriented visuals for stakeholders.

Capgemini Technology Services India Limited ‚Äì Sr HR Analyst (Sep 2021 ‚Äì Oct 2023)Bangalore, Karnataka, India



Spearheaded full-cycle recruitment for high-volume and senior-level roles, optimizing hiring processes to achieve a 20% reduction in time-to-hire.


Partnered with hiring managers to refine job postings and implement targeted sourcing strategies, resulting in a 15% increase in candidate quality.


Managed candidate inquiries and conducted thorough reference and criminal background checks to maintain compliance and high recruitment standards.


Facilitated new hire onboarding, including paperwork completion and orientation presentations, to ensure a smooth transition for new employees.


Leveraged advanced data analytics tools, including Microsoft Excel and Tableau, to analyze and manage extensive datasets, driving strategic decision-making.


Created and maintained comprehensive candidate tracking systems, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in talent acquisition operations
